I was directed to you because this site was said, to be on your server. 
http://adultsiteinfo.artmam.net/ 
These people are running a fraud Porn business and attaching their site
to others. 
 
Please let me know if you hold this domain on your server, and if your
willing to help. 
If will await your response before I go to the authorities, but I can't
wait for long.
